game.name: Artifact Hunt: Yao
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Artifact Hunt: Yao is a roguelike deck-building game. Collect various Yao souls, seek out different artifacts, combine diverse inscriptions, and create your unique build to experience this adventure full of possibilities.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Artifact Hunt: Yao is a roguelike deck-building game. Collect various Yao souls, seek out different artifacts, combine diverse inscriptions, and create your unique build to experience this adventure full of possibilities.
